text: The SIAI-Marchetti S.211 is a military training aircraft.E. R. Johnson; Lloyd S. Jones, American Military Training Aircraft: Fixed and Rotary-Wing Trainers Since 1916 (Jefferson, NC: McFarland & Company, Inc., 2015), p. 397 It was built in Italy between 1981 and 1994. It was sold to Haiti, Philippines, and Singapore as a training or a light attack aircraft. == References == == Further reading == * Frawley, Gerard, The international directory of military aircraft 2002/2003 . London: Aerospace Publication, 2002. . * Gaillard, Pierre, Avions et hélicoptères militaires d'aujourd'hui Paris, France : Larivière éditions, 1999. . Category:Italian military aircraft
title: SIAI-Marchetti S.211
